___timestamp.description: The time that the revision was saved in YYYY-MM-DDTHH:MM:SSZ format.

___parent_id.description: The revision ID of the preceding revision

___text.description: The content of the revision.  Might be null if the revision content was deleted.

___diff.description: A collection of operations that represent the changes made in this revision.

___a2.description: A reference to a ending token index from the last revision

___b2.description: A reference to a ending token index from the current revision

___a1.description: A reference to a starting token index from the last revision

___b1.description: A reference to a starting token index from the current revision

___page.description: Metadata about the page the revision was saved to

___title.description: The page's full name (including namespace prefix)

___redirect.description: Metadata about the redirect if applicable.  Otherwise, null.

___title.description: The title that this page is redirected to

___restrictions.description: The protection restrictions applied to this page.

___bytes.description: The size of revision content in bytes

___sha1.description: A sha1 hash of the revision content

___comment.description: The revision summary.  Might be null if the summary was deleted.

___contributor.description: Metadata about the user who saved the edit.  Might be null if the contributor information was deleted.

___user_text.description: The user's user_name if registered or the IP address if anon.
